name: grid_0p5_degree
title: 0.5 Decimal Degree Grid (with PRIO Grid ids)
description: Global grid at 0.5 decimal degree resolution, with cells ids to join to PRIO Grid data/shapefile.

extras.citation: Tollefsen, Andreas Forø; Håvard Strand & Halvard Buhaug (2012) PRIO-GRID: A unified spatial data structure. Journal of Peace Research, 49(2): 363-374. doi: 10.1177/0022343311431287
